definitions.definition: in need of rest or sleep:
examples: I was so tired when I got home from work last night that I had a quick nap.

definitions.definition: used to describe people, ideas, or subjects that are not interesting because they are very familiar:
examples: It's always the same tired old faces at these meetings.

definitions.definition: to be bored with an activity or person:
examples: I'm so tired of doing the same job, day after day.
